message.body: Thanks for the brunch invite today, sorry we did not get back to you.

Oh no worries. It was very casual. We will have a brunch in honor of us fresh media-ers!! And it will be great. And we will have some bacon donut pancakes with cream cheese frosting and maple Syrop on top
That sounds like an experience. It was great to talk with you and Saul yesterday, I felt a lot better after our discussions.
We are lucky to have each other. I am so inspired by both of you! I'm learning so much doing fresh media with you both!
